about_the_game:
An all new heroine type, the "Friendly and Slightly Naughty Woman" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D2!

You can now hire “Friendly” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”

～Who is this Friendly and Slightly Naughty Woman?～
A cheerful, friendly, and caring woman. She's a real tease who gets close to people quickly, and she's sure to make any master's heart beat fast. A slightly older chick who treats everyone equally and knows how to make friends with just about anyone. She's proactive and straightforward when it comes to sex and passionate toward the person she's into. She's honest and open about what she likes, and she enjoys giving pleasure as much as receiving it.

A step up from normal personality packs! This DLX edition contains the new 2-person dance “Charm in love.”
On top of that, DLX edition personality packs come with a new underwear set.
Of course, just like normal personality packs, Friendly’s signature maid outfit and hairstyle are included as well.
*All costumes included in this DLC are compatible with the High Poly Body. Check it out if you have COM3D2.5!

•1 costume compatible with both the Normal and High Poly Body!
•1 new lingerie set compatible with both the Normal and High Poly Body!
•1 new hairstyle set compatible with both the Normal and High Poly Body!
•New 2-person dance “Charm in love”!
•Friendly is compatible with over 160 yotogi skills！
•2 Pure Love ADV H-events！
•4 NTR ADV H-events！
•Compatible with Guest Mode! With an all-new guest for Friendly to attend to!
•Friendly’s signature maid outfit and a new hairstyle added！
•Tons of training, work, and pre-yotogi scenes all around the Empire Club to enjoy with Friendly！
•New events featuring Friendly interacting with Muku, Majime, and Rindere！

"Friendly" is not compatible with the following DLC.
For compatibility with each of the listed DLC, please purchase the compatibility DLC packs separately.

CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 GP-01
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-02
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-01Fb

We are currently in the process of developing "GP-01Fb" for "Friendly."
Even in Japan, GP01, GP02, and GP01Fb are at different stages of development for each heroine type.
After development for a given heroine has finished in Japan, that content must be translated. We appreciate your understanding that this takes some time.
We are doing our best to complete development and release content quickly, so please be patient.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

An all new heroine type, the "Friendly and Slightly Naughty Woman" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D2!

You can now hire “Friendly” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”

～Who is this Friendly and Slightly Naughty Woman?～
A cheerful, friendly, and caring woman. She's a real tease who gets close to people quickly, and she's sure to make any master's heart beat fast. A slightly older chick who treats everyone equally and knows how to make friends with just about anyone. She's proactive and straightforward when it comes to sex and passionate toward the person she's into. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8.1/10 (All versions must be 64-bit.)
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad-core 2.5Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 or higher, DirectX11 compatible GPU mid-range or above / GeForce GTX 560 or above OR Radeon R7 260X or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: [About GPU] Not guaranteed to work with Laptops, all in one desktops, and tablet PCs. Not guaranteed to work with Mobile GPU and IntelHD Series GPU. Does not correspond with RadeonHD Series GPU. Please install the latest Graphic Driver that is provided by your PC brand. [About VR device] In the case you playing in VR mode, please meet the minimum system requirements of your VR device. Please install the latest Runtime that is provided by HMD brand. [About Internet Environment] This product does not need internet connection to play, however, some contents will not be available offline. Not compatible with mobile Internet connection and tethering devices. [About OS] Not compatible with 32bitOS. Guaranteed to work only with the latest service pack. Please follow the warranty period of OS providers. Windows 7 has been announced that the warranty lasts until January, 2020.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8.1/10 (All versions must be 64-bit.)
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad-core 3Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 or higher, GeForce GTX 760 or above mid-range to high-end
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
